result.title: State of the Art and Recommendation of Suitable Technologies
result.description: Report on relevant radio technologies for TCMS from other fields including incipient or under development ones. This review will include information of existing, promising or under development technologies and architectures from other fields (e.g. aeronautics, industrial, telecommunications or signalling). The report will include an overview on hardware, protocols, frequencies, performance, simulators and tools, official institutions and bodies, standards and other research projects (c.f. Table 2 Part B - Projects linked with ROLL2RAIL)

result.title: Acoustic noise performances, targets, simulation methods, validation and recommendations
result.description: Compilation of current traction components noise performances, proposal of noise targets for traction components, state of the art of methodologies for the simulation of electromagnetic noise and cooling in traction systems, method used for simulation for each traction component, Simulation results validation with experimental data in every studied traction component. Strength and weakness of the methods including best practices and recommendations of use of the methods to be explored in SHIFT2RAIL
